result.text: Casper, WYO., Oct. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Meta is funding the installation of 180 Gutter Bin stormwater filtration devices near its Cheyenne, Wyoming data center, collaborating with the City of Cheyenne and Casper-based company Frog Creek Partners, an NSF ASCEND Engine-funded company powered by Innosphere, to revive Cheyenne's Crow Creek.
